sentences.cn: “我叫戴……戴……戴维。”他结结巴巴地说道。

sentences.en: Fixed a critical Alora stutter bug.
Fu taught in primary schools, loon majestic, but the speech will be a nervous stutter.
sentences.cn: 阿福在小学任教, 长得人高马大威风凛凛, 只是一紧张讲话就会口吃.

sentences.en: He spoke with a pronounced stutter.
He tended to stutter, which tried her patience.
sentences.cn: 他老结巴，这叫她难以忍受。

sentences.en: I always stutter on my words when I get nervous.
sentences.cn: 当我感到紧张时,我说话总是结巴.

sentences.en: I managed to stutter a reply.
sentences.cn: 我结结巴巴，好不容易应了一句。

sentences.en: I was trembling so hard, I thought I would stutter when I spoke.
sentences.cn: 我抖得厉害，感觉说话舌头会打结。

sentences.en: Ron Artest made George W . Bush stutter by just staring at him.
sentences.cn: 布什被阿泰盯着的时候会口吃.

sentences.en: Some people who stutter repeat sounds.
sentences.cn: 有些人结巴是重复声音.

sentences.en: The British decline may make the world economy stutter -- but no more than that.
sentences.cn: 英国经济下降有可能使世界经济徘徊不前,但不过如此而已.

sentences.en: The little girl speaks with a little stutter.
sentences.cn: 那小女孩说话有点口吃.

sentences.en: The moment he relaxes his concentration, he will lapse into a stutter.
sentences.cn: 他思想一不集中, 就结结巴巴起来.

sentences.en: Those who stutter often receive speech therapy.
sentences.cn: 那些口吃者经常接受语言治疗.

sentences.en: Though Han Hs ǚ eh - y ǚ was not a deaf - mute, he did have a slight stutter.
sentences.cn: 韩学愈虽 非 哑巴, 天生有点口吃.

sentences.en: When someone asks me what business I am in I become embarrassed stutter and stammer.
sentences.cn: 当有人问我从事什么职业时,我感到很尴尬,脸发烫,结结巴巴地难以启齿.

trans.tran_en: an inability to speak normally because you stutter
to speak with difficulty because you cannot stop yourself from repeating the first  consonant  of some words

trans.tran_cn: 结结巴巴地说，不顺畅的工作，时断时续地移动
